title: Biden approves antipersonnel mines for Ukraine, undoing his own policy
content: The controversial White House move to send Kyiv land mines comes as Russia’s advances in eastern Ukraine threaten to overwhelm front-line defenses.
summary: The controversial White House move to send Kyiv land mines comes as Russia’s advances in eastern Ukraine threaten to overwhelm front-line defenses.

title: Ukraine fires U.S.-made ATACMS missiles into Russia for first time
content: Ukraine’s ATACMS strike in Russia’s Bryansk region marks an intensification of the war amid uncertainty over Donald Trump’s return to the White House.
summary: Ukraine’s ATACMS strike in Russia’s Bryansk region marks an intensification of the war amid uncertainty over Donald Trump’s return to the White House.

title: Pentagon misstated how Special Operations troops died off Cyprus last year
content: A Special Operations helicopter deployed in response to fighting in Gaza crashed during target practice, not aerial refueling, as the Pentagon said last year.
summary: A Special Operations helicopter deployed in response to fighting in Gaza crashed during target practice, not aerial refueling, as the Pentagon said last year.

title: Iraq bans alcohol in hotels and clubs, bringing country close to near-total ban
content: Alcohol has long been easily accessible in Baghdad, but a crackdown in recent years has made booze much more difficult to find.
summary: Alcohol has long been easily accessible in Baghdad, but a crackdown in recent years has made booze much more difficult to find.

title: What is ATACMS, the U.S.-made weapon Ukraine used to strike Russia?
content: The Biden administration gave Ukraine permission to use the powerful guided-missile system inside Russian territory, reversing previous restrictions.
summary: The Biden administration gave Ukraine permission to use the powerful guided-missile system inside Russian territory, reversing previous restrictions.

title: Congressional committee advises revoking China’s trade status
content: Bipartisan group recommends end to Beijing’s decades-long permanent normal trade status and calls for “Manhattan Project-type” American AI fund.
summary: Bipartisan group recommends end to Beijing’s decades-long permanent normal trade status and calls for “Manhattan Project-type” American AI fund.

title: Germany suspects sabotage after undersea internet cables are severed
content: The C-Lion1 cable between Finland and Germany was severed in the Baltic Sea, its operator said, after damage was reported to another cable linking Lithuania and Sweden.
summary: The C-Lion1 cable between Finland and Germany was severed in the Baltic Sea, its operator said, after damage was reported to another cable linking Lithuania and Sweden.

title: Israel’s war on Hezbollah takes terrible toll on Lebanon’s children
content: At least 231 children have been killed and 1,330 injured, according to the Lebanese Health Ministry.
summary: At least 231 children have been killed and 1,330 injured, according to the Lebanese Health Ministry.

title: Sweden and Finland, wary of war, give new guidance on how to survive one
content: The two Nordic nations joined NATO after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine. With tensions rising, they are preparing their citizens in the event the threat spreads.
summary: The two Nordic nations joined NATO after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine. With tensions rising, they are preparing their citizens in the event the threat spreads.

title: Hong Kong sentences 45 pro-democracy leaders to prison terms of up to 10 years
content: The activists were arrested over a single day in 2021 and charged with “conspiracy to commit subversion” for taking part in an unofficial primary election.
summary: The activists were arrested over a single day in 2021 and charged with “conspiracy to commit subversion” for taking part in an unofficial primary election.

title: Netanyahu says Israel damaged ‘component’ of Iran’s nuclear program in Oct. strikes
content: Netanyahu said Monday that a “specific component” of Iran’s nuclear program had been damaged in last month’s Israeli attack on Iranian military facilities.
summary: Netanyahu said Monday that a “specific component” of Iran’s nuclear program had been damaged in last month’s Israeli attack on Iranian military facilities.

title: Gangs looting Gaza aid operate in areas under Israeli control, aid groups say
ACLU files lawsuit seeking details on Trump’s plan for mass deportation
content: The lawsuit alleges that U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement has failed to respond to requests for basic information about matters, including flights.
summary: The lawsuit alleges that U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement has failed to respond to requests for basic information about matters, including flights.

title: Gangs looting Gaza aid operate in areas under Israeli control, aid groups say
content: A U.N. memo obtained by The Post concluded that gangs “may be benefiting from a passive if not active benevolence” or “protection” from Israel’s military.
summary: A U.N. memo obtained by The Post concluded that gangs “may be benefiting from a passive if not active benevolence” or “protection” from Israel’s military.

title: Police investigate security breach after thefts from Windsor Castle estate
content: Two suspects broke into a farm on the Windsor Castle estate, home to Prince William, Catherine, Princes of Wales and their family, last month.
summary: Two suspects broke into a farm on the Windsor Castle estate, home to Prince William, Catherine, Princes of Wales and their family, last month.

title: U.S. envoy to travel to Lebanon in sign of possible progress on cease-fire
South Africa denies illegal miners food and water to force them out
content: Officials are blocking access to basic supplies for hundreds of people underground in a northwest mine shaft as part of a crackdown on miners.
summary: Officials are blocking access to basic supplies for hundreds of people underground in a northwest mine shaft as part of a crackdown on miners.

title: U.S. imposes sanctions on Israeli settlers and groups over West Bank violence
4 typhoons have hit the Philippines in just the past 10 days
content: It’s the most active November on record after a slow start to the 2024 Pacific typhoon season that’s now in hyperdrive.
summary: It’s the most active November on record after a slow start to the 2024 Pacific typhoon season that’s now in hyperdrive.

title: Russia says U.S. adding ‘fuel to the fire’ by letting Ukraine use ATACMS
content: Vladimir Putin has warned that allowing U.S. weapons to strike inside Russia would make the United States a direct party to the conflict.
summary: Vladimir Putin has warned that allowing U.S. weapons to strike inside Russia would make the United States a direct party to the conflict.

title: Pope calls for investigation on whether genocide is taking place in Gaza
content: While Pope Francis has criticized the war before, this is the first time he has publicly suggested an investigation, according to excerpts from a new book.
summary: While Pope Francis has criticized the war before, this is the first time he has publicly suggested an investigation, according to excerpts from a new book.
